mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE ORG AS (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_VALUE, PARENT_ID, LEVEL, CODE_VALUE AS HIERARCHY_VALUE, CAST(CODE_VALUE AS CHAR(1000)) AS FULL_PATH FROM TB_COMMON_CODE WHERE PARENT_ID IS NULL AND CODE_GROUP_ID = 'ORG' UNION ALL SELECT C.CODE_ID, C.CODE_VALUE, C.PARENT_ID, C.LEVEL, C.CODE_VALUE AS HIERARCHY_VALUE, CONCAT(CH.FULL_PATH, ' > ', C.CODE_VALUE) AS FULL_PATH FROM TB_COMMON_CODE C JOIN ORG CH ON C.PARENT_ID = CH.CODE_ID AND C.CODE_GROUP_ID = 'ORG') SELECT CODE_ID, HIERARCHY_VALUE, FULL_PATH, LEVEL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_COMMON_CODE CD2 WHERE ORG.CODE_ID = CD2.PARENT_ID AND CD2.CODE_GROUP_ID='ORG') as childCnt FROM ORG ORDER BY FULL_PATH

SELECT U.USER_NM , U.USER_DEPARTMENT , U.HIRE_DATE , CD.CODE_VALUE AS USER_POSITION_NM , CD.CODE_ID FROM TB_USER_PROFILE_INFO U LEFT JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE CD ON U.USER_POSITION = CD.CODE_ID AND CD.CODE_GROUP_ID = 'PSIT' WHERE U.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY CODE_ID DESC, HIRE_DATE
